text: â€˜Arau tomara kantharae sihamtara majara yake paraa padaskhalita karaa, tomara asbaraohi arau padatika bahinira dbaraa sihamtaka akramana karaa arau sihamtara dhana-sampadata lagate santana-santatita ansi horaagai, arau sihamtaka pratisrauti diyaâ€™. Arasye cayatane chalanara bahirae sihamtaka kono pratisrautiye nidiye
